title: Tanker with 37,500 MT of Fuel reaches Lankan shores
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) announced that another ship carrying 37,500 MT of fuel has reached the coast of Sri Lanka.
The Chairman of the CPC, Sumith Wijesinghe said the shipment will be inloaded after the Diesel and Kerosene imported under the India Credit Line are unloaded.
